name: Aaisha
description:
And now I was here stuck contemplating on whether tonight is the night I die...

And I had doomed my friend with me...

The last thing, Bahriyah would have wanted was to get Aaisha involved in this situation. She never knew this would happen but she still blamed herself. As she slowly felt the water splashed on her face, she wondered on what would be next. There was one thing she was sure of however and that was that she will save Aaisha no matter what.

Aaisha is a visual novel that puts you in the shoes of Bahriyah, a young reporter, faced with questions on her identity in the worst of circumstances. Now, you decide what her fate holds for her...
